critique: This document is a transfer of land to the Tennessee Valley Authority. It is difficult to assess its political bias without more context. However, we can make some educated guesses. The TVA is a federal entity, so this suggests a strengthening of federal power. The TVA was created as part of the New Deal, which was a liberal project, so we can assume a slight liberal tilt. The TVA also involved economic intervention, so we can assume a slight interventionist tilt. There is no information about immigration, national security, or social inclusion, so we can assume a neutral stance on these issues.
